alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 06 at 3:56PM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester, Northwest Suffolk and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread minor flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Expect up to 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential exists for widespread moderate coastal flooding with the Wednesday AM high tide next week in response to a strong storm system affecting the region late Tuesday into Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 06/07 PM 7.1/ 7.6 -0.8/-0.2 1.3/ 1.8 2-4 NONE 07/07 AM 10.0/10.5 2.2/ 2.7 2.8/ 3.4 2-3 MINOR BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
